pageContext.title: In brief: Indonesian jewelry e-tailer banks series B funding
pageContext.content:
Indonesian jewelry ecommerce site Orori has raised an undisclosed amount of series B funding from Singapore-based Amand Ventures and its affiliate, according to George Budi Sumantri, the startupâ€™s founder and CEO.

In 2014, Orori secured a reported seven-figure series A sum led by Indonusa Dwitama and joined by 500 Startups, East Ventures, and Spiral Ventures.

Source: DealStreetAsia

seo.title: Indonesian jewelry etailer banks series B funding
seo.description: Orori raised seven-figure series A funding back in 2014.
